claims.object: broad, meso-fold of peritoneum, which connects the transverse colon to the posterior wall of the abdomen

surface_layer.definition: The transverse mesocolon is a broad, meso-fold of peritoneum, which connects the transverse colon to the posterior wall of the abdomen.

epistemic_metadata.source: Transverse mesocolon | Radiology Reference Article | Radiopaedia.org
